text: The DS2000 is a geostationary communications satellite bus designed and manufactured by Mitsubishi Electric of Japan. Designed to carry payloads between and , with power requirements of up to 15 kW, it is compatible with Ariane 5, Proton-M, Zenit-3SL, Atlas V, Falcon 9 and H-IIA. According to Moog- ISP, the DS2000 platform uses its bipropellant thrusters. ==List of satellites== Satellites using the DS2000 platform. {| class="wikitable" style="" |- ! Satellite ! Order !
